channel.title: Sophistication | Project - Need Beginners | Good learning experience
channel.description:
[center][size=8pt][b][u]Introduction[/u]
Hello. I'm looking for a development team. I'm thinking between 2 and 4 people recruited. I'm looking for beginners because I am a beginner, but I believe I could be a lot more productive if I work with others, and this is something I've been wanting to do for a while now.
[font=georgia][/font][/b][u]Why I'm making this project[/u] I've been wanting to pimp out a server for a while now... I just want to do it so I can learn from it & move on. I'm looking to really make this server the best it can be.
Positions Needed: Server Developer x1-x2 Client Developer x1-x2 GFX Developer x1 Other (random talent) x1-x2
Update log: _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ [End]
[b]Application: -I give no permission for anyone to release this for any reason other than me: PI_Developer
Skype(withHeadset): Proof of Work(links, projects, etc...): How many hours a day can you work?: Why should I consider you: Anything else?: Spot?:[/b]
Just as a reminder, I'm looking for beginners, you can't know nothing, but you can know enough.
[/size][/center]

item.title: Sophistication | Project - Need Beginners | Good learning experience
item.dc:creator: @PI_Developer PI_Developer
item.description:
@PI_Developer wrote:

BrandonHarkness:

Good luck, good to see a start of what could be some potential new big people ;)!

Thanks

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:3, topic:525597”]I have to respect the fact that you actually want to learn and that you are wanting to learn with other beginners. Best of luck

P.s. I still honestly suggest just reading up on oracle instead of rsps…[/quote]
Thanks. I probably would, but I’d like to practice on RSPS lol.

[quote=“zlLux, post:4, topic:525597”]Msn/Skype: I’ll pm if I get accepted
Proof of Work(links, projects, etc…):I don’t have any proof
How many hours a day can you work?:4 hours at least a day
Why should I consider you:I have hosted minecraft servers and some rsps. I am far in to C++ programming and understand java ok but have never put it to a practical use.
Anything else?: I know how to run a linux server and learn quickly

Spot: server programmer[/quote]
Let’s see what you got bud. PM me your contact info

[quote=“staticfish1, post:5, topic:525597”]Msn/Skype: bwhitley57
Proof of Work(links, projects, etc…): will send over skype
How many hours a day can you work?: 4 or more
Why should I consider you: I have experience with PI and I’m not a beginner
Anything else?: nope[/quote]
HMU.

Read full topic
